promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic rabbit psychic-type pokemon holding a dark club. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cavimyst, a a dynamic basic rabbit psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Strange Poison. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "psychic" or "Cavimyst". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, rabbit-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Cavimyst, the mystical burrow dweller, uses its vibrant poison in caves to intuitively protect its territory and communicate with its clan.
